description: To help whittle the time away, three sentries and the commandant's chauffer take a piss break to relieve their bladders and more importantly their sexual ennui. A coy game of show and tell turns into an erotic exercise of dingaling diddling as three of the four studly troopers jerk off like naughty schoolboys climaxing with them drizzling their voyeuristic buddy with their jism. Meanwhile, Zak's trusted officer, Shawn Justin has been assigned with guarding a metal box containing material that will guarantee the success of their operation. But can he be trusted?
series: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
title: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict, Scene #04
